component.name: getSyncs
component.description: Retrieves all syncs that match the criteria specified in the URL parameters.

component.name: getSyncsDataById
component.description: Retrieves the data for the specified sync.

component.name: getSyncsLogsById
component.description: Retrieves the logs for the specified sync.

component.name: getSyncsRejectsById
component.description: Retrieves raw data about validation failures during the specified import sync.

component.name: createSync
component.description: Triggers a sync on the import or export specified in the request body.
